content: the middle section middle with mc yarn still attached to belly strap begin working in the round again round 12 11ch counts as 1tr 8ch skip to back section 1tr in each st across back 8ch skip to belly strap 1tr in st across belly strap slip_stitch into top of beg 3ch 60 sts round 13 1tr in each st around 60 sts round 14 work treble_crochet stitches around increase by 4 evenly 64 sts rounds 15 - 18 work 4 rounds of straight treble_crochet 64 sts do not break yarn now start shaping back section and adding length back / length the back section will now begin to curve away from the underside of the belly as length is added to begin a small section of stitches on the underbelly will be left unworked the unworked stitches should line up with the belly strap as closely as possible make slip stitches if needed to get the yarn to the right place roughly in line with left side of belly strap or if necessary break and re-join yarn continuing in mc yarn working back and forth in row row 19 2ch 1tr tr2tog 1tr in next 50 sts tr2tog 52 sts 54 worked leaves 10 stitches unworked row 20 2ch 1tr tr2tog treble_crochet to last 2 sts tr2tog 50 sts row 21 - 27 work 7 row as row 20 36 sts row 28 - 29 work 2 row of straight treble_crochet 36 sts row 30 2ch tr2tog tr3tog treble_crochet to last 3 sts tr3tog 32 sts row 31 - 33 work 3 row as row 30 18 sts break yarn edging worked in the round to finish neck opening and around back edge legs edges left unworked neck edging with neck base of round 1 facing up join cc4 to bottom of a fdtr st round 1 1tr in each stitch around round 2 1htr 1fptr around break yarn body edging with underside of belly facing up join cc4 to any unworked stitch from row 18 round 1 1tr in each stitch around making increases or decreases as needed to following shaping of body round 2 1htr 1fptr around making increases or decreased as needed with half_double_crochet stitches only break yarn © 2023 sandra paul 5 of 7 bertie s jumper www cherryheart co uk pattern - us terms body worked in the round from foundation double stitch start with mc yarn and 4 0mm hook round 1 fddc 46 slip_stitch in starting st to form a loop 46 sts round 2 work double_crochet stitches around increase by 4 evenly 50 sts round 3 work double_crochet stitches around increase by 4 evenly 54 sts break yarn and join cc1 round 4 work a round of shells two increase shells spaced evenly 20 shells break yarn and join cc2 round 5 work a round of shells two increase shells spaced evenly 22 shells break yarn and join cc3 round 6 work round of shells 22 shells break yarn now divide
